name.jp: ドラゴンリープエクステンド

desc.en:
[Dragoon Dive] use +1

When using [Dragoon Dive], [Dragoon Dive+] 
• Increases Critical BRV damage dealt by 50%
• [Magitek Armament] duration +3

When using [Dragoon Dive] 
• BRV attack hit count becomes 6 
• Increases total BRV potency by 60% 
• Stolen BRV can overflow up to 150% Max BRV

When using [Dragoon Dive+] 
• BRV attack hit count becomes 6 
• Increases total BRV potency by 90% 
• Stolen BRV can overflow up to 180% Max BRV
• Target delay +1

[Boost Lance] 
• BRV attack hit count becomes 3 
• Increases total BRV potency by 60% 

[High-Boost Lance] 
• BRV attack hit count becomes 2 
• Increases total BRV potency by 80% 
• Stolen BRV can overflow up to 120% Max BR
desc.gl:
Dragoon Dive use +1

When using Dragoon Dive, Dragoon Dive+:
 • Moderately increased BRV damage with critical hits
 • Magitek Armament duration +3

When using Dragoon Dive:
 • BRV attack hit count becomes 6; moderately increased cumulative BRV damage
 • Stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 150%

When using Dragoon Dive+:
 • BRV attack hit count becomes 6; tremendously increased cumulative BRV damage
 • Stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 180%
 • Target delay +1

When using Boost Lance:
 • BRV attack hit count becomes 3; moderately increased cumulative BRV damage
 • Turn rate+

When using High-Boost Lance:
 • BRV attack hit count becomes 2; largely increased cumulative BRV damage
 • Stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 120%

desc.en:
[Saint Blast] use +3

When using [Saint Blast]
• BRV attack hit count becomes 6
• Increases total BRV potency by 150%
• Stolen BRV can overflow up to 150% Max BRV
• Increases HP damage dealt to non-targets by 30%

While [Red Wings] is active
• [BRV Attack] becomes [BRV Attack+]
　∟ AoE Holy melee BRV attack (BRV potency 80%)
　∟ Increases BRV damage dealt by 60% when attacking single target
　∟ Recovers party's HP by 50% BRV damage dealt (limit 10% of MAX HP)
　∟ Increases party's BRV by 50% of own current HP
• [HP Attack] becomes [HP Attack+]
　∟ Holy melee BRV attack + HP attack (BRV potency 90%)
　∟ Increases allies' BRV by 50% of HP damage dealt

name.jp: セルキースローエクステンド

desc.en:
[Selkie Throw] use +2

When using [Selkie Throw]
• BRV attack hit count becomes 4
• Increases total BRV potency by 160%
• Stolen BRV can overflow up to 120% Max BRV
• Deals 50% HP damage to non-targets
• [Selkie Soul] duration +3
• Self: 6 turns 50% [ATK Up]

While [Selkie Soul] is active
• [BRV Attack] becomes [BRV Attack+]
　∟ BRV attack hit count becomes 2
　∟ Increases total BRV potency by 80%
　∟ Increases party's BRV by 10% of Max BRV
• [HP Attack] becomes [HP Attack+]
　∟ Increases party's BRV by 10% of Max BRV before BRV attack
　∟ Ranged BRV Attack + HP Attack (BRV potency 80%)
• During [Chase], [BRV Attack] becomes [Selkie Chase (BRV)]
　∟ If target is not broken, reduce BRV to 0
　∟ Increases party's BRV by 40% of Max BRV
　∟ Target: 6 turns [Fitted Enfeeblement] 
• During [Chase], [HP Attack] becomes [Selkie Chase (HP)]
　∟ Increases party's BRV by 20% of Max BRV before HP attack
　∟ Target: 6 turns [Fitted Enfeeblement] 

[Fitted Enfeeblement]
• Lowers Defense by 20%, Speed by 10%
desc.gl:
Selkie Throw use +2

When using Selkie Throw:
 • BRV attack hit count becomes 4; tremendously increased cumulative BRV damage
 • Stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 120%
 • Deals 50% HP damage to non-targets
 • Selkie Soul duration +3
 • Self: 6 turns ATK Up II

While Selkie Soul active: 
 • BRV Attack becomes BRV Attack+ (BRV attack hit count becomes 2; greatly increased cumulative BRV damage; grants party BRV based on own MAX BRV)
 • HP Attack becomes HP Attack+ (grants party BRV based on own MAX BRV before attack; ranged BRV attack + HP attack)
 • BRV Attack becomes Selkie Chase (BRV) (reduces target's BRV to 0 if not afflicted with Break; grants party BRV based on own MAX BRV; target: 6 turns Fitted Enfeeblement) during chain attacks
 • HP Attack becomes Selkie Chase (HP) (grants party BRV based on own MAX BRV; HP attack; target: 6 turns Fitted Enfeeblement) during chain attacks

name.jp: スプレッドパルサーエクステンド

desc.en:
[Pulsar Burst] use +2

When using [Pulsar Burst], [Pulsar Burst+]
• Granted buffs duration +2
• Increases BRV damage dealt by 50% when attacking debuffed target

When using [Pulsar Burst]
• BRV attack hit count becomes 6
• Increases total BRV potency by 120%
• Stolen BRV can overflow up to 150% Max BRV

When using [Pulsar Burst+]
• BRV attack hit count becomes 8
• Increases total BRV potency by 120%
• Stolen BRV can overflow up to 180% Max BRV

When [Body and Soul] is active
• [BRV Attack] becomes [BRV Attack+]
　∟ BRV attack hit count becomes 2
　∟ Increases total BRV potency by 20%
• Increases BRV damage dealt by 50% when attacking debuffed target
• [HP Attack] becomes [HP Attack+]
　∟ 2-HIT melee BRV + HP attack (30% per hit)
• Increases BRV damage dealt by 50% when attacking debuffed target

When [Body and Soul] is at least 3 levels
• [BRV Attack+] becomes [BRV Attack++]
　∟ BRV attack hit count becomes 4
　∟ Increases total BRV potency by 80%
• [HP Attack+] becomes [HP Attack++]
　∟ BRV attack hit count becomes 3
　∟ Increases total BRV potency by 60%
　∟ Stolen BRV can overflow up to 120% Max BRV
desc.gl:
When using Pulsar Burst:
 • BRV attack hit count becomes 6; tremendously increased cumulative BRV damage
 • Stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 150%

When using Pulsar Burst+:
 • BRV attack hit count becomes 8; tremendously increased cumulative BRV damage
 • Stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 180%

When using Pulsar Burst, Pulsar Burst+:
 • Granted buff duration +2

While Body and Soul active:
 • BRV Attack becomes BRV Attack+ (BRV attack hit count becomes 2; slightly increased cumulative BRV damage)

name.jp: セイントクロースエクステンド

desc.en:
[Saint Cloth] use +3

When using [Saint Cloth]
• Raises BRV gain based on Max BRV by 20%
• Increases [DEF Up] effect by 70%
• Triggers a 3-HIT magic BRV + HP attack after use (60% per hit)
• Stolen BRV can overflow up to 150% Max BRV

When party has 6 or more active buffs 
• Enables [HP Attack+]
　∟ Magic BRV attack + HP attack (80%)
　∟ Converts % HP damage dealt to ally BRV

When party has 9 or more active buffs
• Enables [HP Attack++]
　∟ BRV attack hitcount becomes 2
　∟ Increases total BRV potency by 80%
　∟ Stolen BRV can overflow up to 120% Max BRV
desc.gl:
Saint Cloth use +2

When using Saint Cloth:
 • Slight boost to BRV granted based on own MAX BRV
 • Large DEF Up effect boost
 • Triggers 2-hit magic BRV attack + HP attack after use
 • Stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 120%

When party has 6 or more buffs:
 • HP Attack becomes HP Attack+ (magic BRV attack + HP attack; grants allies BRV based on HP damage dealt)

When party has 9 or more buffs:
 • HP Attack+ becomes HP Attack++ (BRV attack hit count becomes 2; largely increased cumulative BRV damage; stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 120%)
desc.jp:
「セイントクロース」の使用回数＋3

「セイントクロース」使用時
・自身の最大BRVに依存したBRV加算量小アップ
・「防御力アップ」の効果大アップ
・使用後 追加3HIT魔法BRV攻撃＋HP攻撃が発動
・奪ったBRVを最大BRVを超えて加算する
　上限は自身の最大BRVの150％分
・付与する強化効果の3ACTION期間延長

味方全員の強化効果の数が合計6個以上の時
通常「HP攻撃」が以下の「HP攻撃＋」に変化
・魔法BRV攻撃＋HP攻撃
・与えたHPダメージに依存した量のBRVを
　自身以外の味方全員に加算

味方全員の強化効果の数が合計9個以上の時
「HP攻撃＋」が「HP攻撃＋＋」に変化し
以下の効果が追加
・BRV攻撃のHIT数が2HITに変化し
　合計BRV威力も大アップ
・奪ったBRVを最大BRVを超えて加算する
　上限は自身の最大BRVの120％分

name.jp: 雷鳴剣エクステンド

desc.en:
When using [Thunder Slash], [Thunder Slash+]
• BRV attack becomes AoE
• Increases total BRV potency by 60%
• Raises BRV damage dealt by 60% when attacking single target
• [Noble Loyalty] effects +10%; duration +2

When using [Thunder Slash]
• BRV attack hit count becomes 3
• Stolen BRV can overflow up to 150% Max BRV
• Deals 20% HP damage to non-targets

When using [Thunder Slash+]
• BRV attack hit count becomes 6
• Stolen BRV can overflow up to 180% Max BRV
• Deals 50% HP damage to non-targets

When party has 6 or more buffs
• [BRV Attack] becomes [BRV Attack+]
　∟ 2-HIT magic BRV attack
　∟ Increases total BRV potency by 20%
　∟ Grants party BRV by 70% of Attack

When party has 9 or more buffs
• [BRV Attack+] becomes [BRV Attack++]
　∟ BRV attack hit count becomes 3
　∟ Increases total BRV potency by 60%
　∟ Party's gained BRV can overflow up to 120% Max BRV
desc.gl:
When using Thunder Slash, Thunder Slash+:
 • Becomes group BRV attack
 • Moderately increased BRV damage when attacking single target
 • Slight Noble Loyalty boost, duration +2

When using Thunder Slash:
 • BRV attack hit count becomes 3; moderately increased cumulative BRV damage
 • Stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 150%

When using Thunder Slash+:
 • BRV attack hit count becomes 6; moderately increased cumulative BRV damage
 • Stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 180%

When party has 6 or more buffs:
 • BRV Attack becomes BRV Attack+ (magic BRV attack; BRV attack hit count becomes 2; slightly increased cumulative BRV damage; grants party BRV based on own ATK after BRV attack)

When party has 9 or more buffs:
 • BRV Attack+ becomes BRV Attack++ (BRV attack hit count becomes 3; moderately increased cumulative BRV damage; increased BRV may exceed individual MAX BRV up to 120%)

name.jp: バッシュアタックエクステンド

desc.en:
When using [Bash]
• Raises party BRV based on Attack
• BRV attack hit count becomes 5
• Tremendously raises total BRV potency 
• Stolen BRV can overflow up to 150% Max BRV

While [Crystal Caravan] is active
• [BRV Attack] becomes [BRV Attack+]
　∟ BRV attack hit count becomes 2
　∟ Moderately raises total BRV potency 
　∟ Acquires 1 [Drop of Myrrh] (limit 5)
• [HP Attack] becomes [HP Attack+]
　∟ Melee BRV attack + HP attack
　∟ Acquires 1 [Drop of Myrrh] (limit 5)
　∟ * Priority given to [Soulshot] when conditions are met
desc.gl:
When using Bash:
 • BRV attack hit count becomes 3; tremendously increased cumulative BRV damage
 • Stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 120%

While Crystal Caravan active:
 • BRV Attack becomes BRV Attack+ (BRV attack hit count becomes 2; moderately increased cumulative BRV damage; increases special effect Drop of Myrrh by 1 [limit 5])
 • HP Attack becomes HP Attack+ (melee BRV attack + HP attack; increases special effect Drop of Myrrh by 1 [limit 5]; Soulshot takes priority over HP Attack+)
desc.jp:
「バッシュアタック」使用時
・BRV攻撃前
　味方全員に自身の攻撃力に依存した量のBRV加算
・BRV攻撃のHIT数が5HITに変化し
　合計BRV威力も極大アップ
・奪ったBRVを最大BRVを超えて加算する
　上限は自身の最大BRVの150％分

「クリスタル・キャラバン」付与中
・通常「BRV攻撃」が以下の「BRV攻撃＋」に変化
　-BRV攻撃のHIT数が2HITに変化し
　　合計BRV威力も中アップ
　-自身に特殊効果「ミルラの雫」1加算（上限5）
・通常「HP攻撃」が以下の「HP攻撃＋」に変化
　-近距離物理BRV攻撃＋HP攻撃
　-自身に特殊効果「ミルラの雫」1加算（上限5）
　（特殊効果「ミルラの雫」1以上の時
　「HP攻撃＋」への変化よりも
　「ソウルショット」への変化を優先する）

　∟ 2-HIT Ice melee BRV attack + HP attack delivered twice
　∟ BRV stolen can overflow up to 120% Max BRV
desc.gl:
When using Esoteric Region, Esoteric Region+:
 • Moderate boost to BRV granted based on own ATK

When using Esoteric Region:
 • Triggers additional 2-hit Ice melee BRV attack + HP attack after use
 • Stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 150%
 • Increases BRV by 20% of HP damage dealt

When using Esoteric Region+:
 • Triggers additional 4-hit Ice melee BRV attack + HP attack after use
 • Stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 180%
 • Increases BRV by 30% of HP damage dealt

While Esoteric Region buff active:
 • BRV Attack becomes BRV Attack+ (2-hit Ice melee BRV attack; moderately increased cumulative BRV damage; increases active Esoteric Region buff level by 1)
 • HP Attack becomes HP Attack+ (2-hit Ice melee BRV attack + HP attack; increases active Esoteric Region buff level by 1)

While Desire of Provenance active:
 • BRV Attack becomes BRV Attack++ (4-hit Ice melee BRV attack; tremendously increased cumulative BRV damage; Glacification becomes Glacification+ [moderate BRV damage boost; moderate Paralyze hit rate boost; returns to Glacification after use if conditions to become Glacification are met; returns to Frost Blade if not] after inflicting Break or attacking target afflicted with Break)
 • HP Attack becomes HP Attack++ (2-hit Ice melee BRV attack + HP attack delivered 2 times; stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 120%)

name.jp: 迅雷の型エクステンド

desc.en:
When using 「Quickbolt Stance」:
- BRV attack hit count becomes 2
- Tremendously raises total BRV potency
- Stolen BRV can overflow up to 120% Max BRV
- Extends duration of 「Quickbolt」 by 4 turns

When using 「HP Attack+」:
- BRV attack hit count becomes 2
- Greatly raises total BRV potency

When using 「Lightspeed Jab」:
- Raises BRV based on Attack before attacking
- BRV attack hit count becomes 2
- Greatly raises total BRV potency
- Stolen BRV can overflow up to 120% Max BRV
- Inflicts 「Large Defense Down」 for 2 turns after breaking target or attacking a broken target

When using 「BRV Attack+」:
- Greatly raises total BRV potency
- Turns 「Lightspeed Jab」 into 「Lightspeed Jab+」 after breaking target or attacking a broken target
　∟ Extends the duration of current buffs by 1 turn
　∟ No Action Delay
　∟ Does not increase turn count
　∟ Decreases Friend Support and Summon action count
　∟ Turns back to 「Lightspeed Jab」 after use
desc.gl:
When using Quickbolt Stance:
 • BRV attack hit count becomes 2; tremendously increased cumulative BRV damage
 • Stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 120%
 • Quickbolt duration +4

When using HP Attack+:
 • BRV attack hit count becomes 2; largely increased cumulative BRV damage

When using Lightspeed Jab:
 • Increases BRV based on ATK, before BRV attack
 • BRV attack hit count becomes 2; largely increased cumulative BRV damage
 • Stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 120%
 • Inflicts 2 turns DEF Down III when inflicting Break or attacking target afflicted with Break

When using BRV Attack+:
 • Large BRV damage boost
 • Lightspeed Jab becomes Lightspeed Jab+ after inflicting Break or attacking target afflicted with Break (extends buffs by 1 turn; instant turn rate; does not add to turn count; does consume turn during summoning, support; returns to Lightspeed Jab after use)

name.jp: シールドサブバーターエクステンド

desc.en:
When using [Shield Subverter]
• Increases party's BRV by 30% of Max BRV before BRV attacks
• BRV attack hit count becomes 4 
• Increases total BRV potency by 40% 
• Stolen BRV can overflow up to 150% Max BRV
• [Mnejing's Tactics] duration +2
　∟ [BRV Damage Resist], [DEF Up] effects +20%
　∟ [Debuff Evasion Rate Up] effect +40%
• [Automaton] effects +40%

When using [BRV Attack+ (Fine-Tuning)]
• Increases BRV gain based on Max BRV by 10%
• [Fine-Tuning]
　∟ [BRV Damage Resist], [DEF Up] effects +20%
　∟ [Debuff Evasion Rate Up] effect +40%
• Extends own [Mnejing's Tactics] by 1 turn
• Extends allies' [Automaton] by 1 turn
desc.gl:
When using Shield Subverter:
 • Grants party BRV based on own MAX BRV before BRV attack
 • BRV attack hit count becomes 4; moderately increased cumulative BRV damage
 • Stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 150%
 • Mnejing's Tactics: Slight BRV Damage Resist, DEF Up boost; moderate Elude boost, duration +2
 • Moderate Automaton boost

When using BRV Attack+ (Fine-Tuning):
 • Slight boost to BRV granted to allies
 • Fine-Tuning: Slight BRV Damage Resist, DEF Up boost; moderate Elude boost
 • Extends active Mnejing's Tactics duration 1 turn
 • Extends allies' active Automaton duration 1 turn
desc.jp:
「シールドサブバーター」使用時
・BRV攻撃前に味方全員に
　自身の最大BRVに依存した量のBRVを加算
・BRV攻撃のHIT数が4HITに変化し
　合計BRV威力も中アップ
・奪ったBRVを最大BRVを超えて加算する
　上限は自身の最大BRVの150％分
・「メネジンの戦法」の
　「BRVダメージ軽減」「防御力アップ」の効果小アップと
　「弱体回避アップ」の効果中アップと2ACTION期間延長
・「オートマトン」の効果中アップ

「BRV攻撃＋（微調整）」使用時
・自身以外の味方全員へのBRV加算量小アップ
・「微調整」の
　「BRVダメージ軽減」「防御力アップ」の効果小アップと
　「弱体回避アップ」の効果中アップ
・自身に付与されている
　「メネジンの戦法」を1ACTION延長
・自身以外の味方全員に付与されている
　「オートマトン」を1ACTION延長

name.jp: シックスエレメントエクステンド

desc.en:
When using [Sixth Element]
• Increases BRV potency by 180%
• Stolen BRV can overflow up to 150% Max BRV
• Deals 50% HP damage to non-targets
• [Ovjang's Tactics] duration +2
　∟ [MAX BRV Up], [ATK Up] effects +20%
　∟ [SPD Up] effect +5%
• [Automaton] effects +40%

When using [HP Attack+ (Optimization)]
• BRV attack hit count becomes 2 
• Increases total BRV potency by 110%
• [Optimization]
　∟ [MAX BRV Up], [ATK Up] effects +20%
　∟ [SPD Up] effect +5%
• Extends own [Ovjang's Tactics] by 1 turn
• Extends allies' [Automaton] by 1 turn
desc.gl:
When using Sixth Element:
 • Tremendous BRV damage boost
 • Stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 150%
 • Deals 50% HP damage to non-targets
 • Ovjang's Tactics: Slight MAX BRV Up, ATK Up boost; marginal SPD Up boost, duration +2
 • Moderate Automaton boost

When using HP Attack+ (Optimization):
 • BRV attack hit count becomes 2; tremendously increased cumulative BRV damage
 • Optimization: Slight MAX BRV Up, ATK Up boost; marginal SPD Up boost
 • Extends active Ovjang's Tactics duration 1 turn
 • Extends allies' active Automaton duration 1 turn
desc.jp:
「シックスエレメント」使用時
・BRV威力極大アップ
・奪ったBRVを最大BRVを超えて加算する
　上限は自身の最大BRVの150％分
・ターゲット以外にも50％分のHPダメージ
・「アヴゼンの戦法」の
　「最大BRVアップ」「攻撃力アップ」の効果小アップと
　「素早さアップ」の効果極小アップと2ACTION期間延長
・「オートマトン」の効果中アップ

「HP攻撃＋（最適化）」使用時
・BRV攻撃のHIT数が2HITに変化し
　合計BRV威力も極大アップ
・「最適化」の
　「最大BRVアップ」「攻撃力アップ」の効果小アップと
　「素早さアップ」の効果極小アップ

・自身以外の味方全員に付与されている

name.jp: テンペストブロウエクステンド

desc.en:
When using [Tempeststrike]
• BRV attack hit count becomes 4
• Increases total BRV potency by 120%
• Stolen BRV can overflow up to 120% Max BRV

When attacking broken target
• [Tempeststrike] becomes [Tempeststrike+]
　∟ Cancels target's BREAK bebfore BRV attacks
　∟ Increases BRV potency by 40%
desc.gl:
When using Tempeststrike:
 • BRV attack hit count becomes 4; tremendously increased cumulative BRV damage
 • Stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 120%

When attacking target afflicted with Break:
 • Tempeststrike becomes Tempeststrike+ (cancels target's Break before BRV attack; moderate BRV damage boost)
desc.jp:
「テンペストブロウ」使用時
・BRV攻撃のHIT数が4HITに変化し
　合計BRV威力も極大アップ

「テンペストブロウ」が「テンペストブロウ＋」に切り替わり
以下の効果が追加
・BRV攻撃前に対象のブレイク状態を解除
・BRV威力中アップ

name.jp: 疾風連槍牙エクステンド

desc.en:
When using [Gale Fang]
• Increases BRV potency by 80%
• Stolen BRV can overflow up to 150% Max BRV

When attacking broken target
• [Gale Fang] becomes [Gale Fang+]
　∟ Increases BRV potency by 40%
　∟ Stolen BRV can overflow up to 180% Max BRV

While [Last Hunter] is active
• [BRV Attack] becomes [Fearsiphon]
　∟ BRV attack hit count becomes 2
　∟ Increases total BRV potency by 80%
　∟ Lowers Action Delay by 8 when breaking target or attacking broken target
　∟ Does not consume use count on next turn when breaking target
• [HP Attack] becomes [Scourge]
　∟ Melee BRV attack + HP attack (BRV potency 100%)
　∟ Stolen BRV can overflow up to 120% Max BRV
　∟ Becomes [Scourge+] when attacking broken target
　　∟ BRV attack hit count becomes 2
　　∟ Increases total BRV potency by 40%
　　∟ Stolen BRV can overflow up to 150% Max BRV
desc.gl:
When using Gale Fang:
 • Large BRV damage boost
 • Stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 150%

When attacking target afflicted with Break:
 • Gale Fang becomes Gale Fang+ (moderate BRV damage boost; stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 180%)

While Last Hunter active:
 • BRV Attack becomes Fearsiphon (BRV attack hit count becomes 2; largely increased cumulative BRV damage; higher turn rate when inflicting Break or attacking target afflicted with Break; next turn does not consume ability use count when this ability inflicts Break [some abilities excluded])
 • HP Attack becomes Scourge (melee BRV attack + HP attack; stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 120%; Scourge becomes Scourge+ [BRV attack hit count becomes 2; moderately increased cumulative BRV damage; stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 150%] when attacking target afflicted with Break)
desc.jp:
「疾風連槍牙」使用時
・BRV威力大アップ
・奪ったBRVを最大BRVを超えて加算する
　上限は自身の最大BRVの150％分

ブレイク中の対象攻撃時
「疾風連槍牙」が「疾風連槍牙＋」に切り替わり
以下の効果が追加
・BRV威力中アップ
・奪ったBRVを最大BRVを超えて加算する
　上限は自身の最大BRVの180％分に変化

「ラストハンター」付与中
・通常「BRV攻撃」が以下の「ブレイクアスピル」に変化
　-BRV攻撃のHIT数が2HITに変化し
　　合計BRV威力も大アップ
　-対象ブレイク時 ブレイク中攻撃時
　　行動負荷ダウン
　-対象ブレイク時
　　次の行動時 アビリティの使用回数を消費しない
　　（一部のアビリティを除く）
・通常「HP攻撃」が以下の「ブレイクバースト」に変化
　-近距離物理BRV攻撃＋HP攻撃に変化
　-奪ったBRVを最大BRVを超えて加算する
　　上限は自身の最大BRVの120％分
　-ブレイク中の対象攻撃時
　　「ブレイクバースト」が「ブレイクバースト＋」に切り替わり
　　以下の効果が追加
　　　-BRV攻撃のHIT数が2HITに変化し
　　　　合計BRV威力も中アップ
　　　-奪ったBRVを最大BRVを超えて加算する
　　　　上限は自身の最大BRVの150％分に変化

name.jp: スターシェルエクステンド

desc.en:
When using [Starshell]
• Increases BRV gain based on Attack by 100%
• [Lock], [Evasion Rate Up] duration +1
• Party: 12 turns 30% [PHY ATK Up]
• Triggers a 3-HIT ranged BRV attack + HP attack after use (80% per hit)
• Stolen BRV can overflow up to 150% Max BRV
desc.gl:
When using Starshell:
 • Tremendously increased BRV based on ATK
 • Lock duration +1
 • Evasion Up duration +1
 • Party: 12 turns PHY ATK Up I
 • Triggers additional 3-hit ranged BRV attack + HP attack on target after use
 • Stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 150%
desc.jp:
「スターシェル」使用時
・自身の攻撃力に依存したBRV加算量極大アップ
・「ターゲット固定」の1ACTION期間延長
・「回避率アップ」の1ACTION期間延長
・味方全員に12ACTION「物理攻撃力小アップ」付与
・使用後 ターゲットに追加
　3HIT遠距離物理BRV攻撃＋HP攻撃が発動
・奪ったBRVを最大BRVを超えて加算する
　上限は自身の最大BRVの150％分

name.jp: バフアタックブーストオール

desc.gl: Slightly raises party's MAX BRV, ATK with active buffs
desc.jp: 自身に強化効果が付与されている時\n味方全員の最大BRVと攻撃力小アップ

name.jp: ペネトレイトエクステンド

desc.en:
When using [Piercer]
• BRV attack hit count becomes 5
• Increases total BRV potency by 150%
• Stolen BRV can overflow up to 120% Max BRV
• Deals 50% HP damage to non-targets
• [DEF Down] duration +2
• [Life of the Party]
　∟ [MAX BRV Up] effect +10%
　∟ [ATK Up] effect +30%

When using [BRV Attack+]
• BRV attack hit count becomes 2
• Increases total BRV potency by 40%

When using [Overkill]
• Increases party's BRV by 80% of Attack before BRV attacks
• BRV attack hit count becomes 4
• Increases total BRV potency by 40%
• Lowers Action Delay to 24

When using [HP Attack+]
• Increases BRV potency by 40%

When using [Crackshot]
• Increases BRV potency by 40%
• Deals 20% HP damage to non-targets
desc.gl:
When using Piercer:
 • BRV attack hit count becomes 5; tremendously increased cumulative BRV damage
 • Stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 120%
 • Deals 50% HP damage to non-targets
 • DEF Down duration +2
 • Slight boost to Life of the Party
 
When using BRV Attack+:
 • BRV attack hit count becomes 2; moderately increased cumulative BRV damage
 
When using Overkill: 
 • Grants party BRV based on own ATK before BRV attack
 • BRV attack hit count becomes 4; moderately increased cumulative BRV damage
 • Turn rate+
 
When using HP Attack+, Crackshot: 
 • Moderate BRV damage boost
 
When using Crackshot: 
 • Deals 20% HP damage to non-targets
desc.jp:
「ペネトレイト」使用時
・BRV攻撃のHIT数が5HITに変化し
　合計BRV威力も極大アップ
・奪ったBRVを最大BRVを超えて加算する
　上限は自身の最大BRVの120％分
・ターゲット以外にも50％分のHPダメージ
・「防御力ダウン」の2ACTION期間延長
・「ムードメーカー」の効果小アップ

「BRV攻撃＋」使用時
・BRV攻撃のHIT数が2HITに変化し
　合計BRV威力も中アップ

「レイドキル」使用時
・BRV攻撃前に味方全員に
　自身の攻撃力に依存した量のBRVを加算
・BRV攻撃のHIT数が4HITに変化し
　合計BRV威力も中アップ
・行動負荷ダウン

「HP攻撃＋」「ブレイクブロー」使用時
・BRV威力中アップ

「ブレイクブロー」使用時
・ターゲット以外にも20％分のHPダメージ

desc.en:
When using break Attack:
- BRV attack hit count becomes 3.
- Moderately raises its total potency.
- Greatly raises BRV damage dealt to enemies afflicted with Status Break.
- Stolen BRV can overflow up to 120% Max BRV.
- Extends the duration of Status Break by 2 turns.
- Triggers an HP attack after use.

While Dressphere is active:
- Turns BRV Attack to BRV Attack+.
- BRV Attack+ is a 2-HIT melee BRV attack with a moderate potency increase.
desc.gl:
When using Break Attack:
 • BRV attack hit count becomes 3; moderately increased cumulative BRV damage
 • Deals extra BRV damage to targets afflicted with Status Break 
 • Stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 120%
 • Status Break duration +2
 • Triggers additional HP attack after use

While Dressphere active:
 • BRV Attack becomes BRV Attack+ (BRV attack hit count becomes 2; moderately increased cumulative BRV damage)

name.jp: スニークスラッシュエクステンド

desc.en:
「Sneak Slash」 use +2

When using 「Sneak Slash」:
- BRV attack hit count becomes 3
- Tremendously raises its total potency
- Stolen BRV can overflow up to 120% Max BRV
- Extends the duration of 「Thief's Gloves」 by 1 turn
- Triggers an HP attack after use

After use, 「Sneak Slash」 turns into 「Sneak Slash+」 with the following effects:
- If the target is hit, moves the user's next turn right before the target's turn (except during Summon)
- Cancels existing 「Genji's Gloves」 and 「Miracle Shoes」
- Randomly grants 「Genji's Gloves」 or 「Miracle Shoes」 for 6 turns
- Reverts back to 「Sneak Slash」 after use

When using 「Mug」:
- BRV attack hit count becomes 2.
- Moderately raises its total potency
- Extends of duration of 「Genji's Gloves」 or 「Miracle Shoes」 by 1 turn

When using 「HP Attack+ (Genji Gloves)」:
- Greatly raises its potency
- Stolen BRV can overflow up to 120% Max BRV

When using 「HP Attack+ (Miracle Shoes)」:
- Greatly raises its potency
- Doesn't increase turn count
- Decreases Friend Support and Summon action count
desc.gl:
Sneak Slash use +2

When using Sneak Slash:
 • BRV attack hit count becomes 3; tremendously increased cumulative BRV damage
 • Stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 120%
 • Brigand's Glove duration +1
 • Triggers additional HP attack after use

After using Sneak Slash:
 • Sneak Slash becomes Sneak Slash+ (moves own next turn to just before target's next turn on hit [except during summoning]; cancels previously granted Genji Glove, Miracle Shoes; self: 6 turns Genji Glove or Miracle Shoes; returns to Sneak Slash after use)

When using Mug:
 • BRV attack hit count becomes 2; moderately increased cumulative BRV damage
 • Genji Glove, Miracle Shoes duration +1

When using HP Attack+ (Genji Glove):
 • Large BRV damage boost
 • Stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 120%

When using HP Attack+ (Miracle Shoes):
 • Large BRV damage boost
 • Does not add to turn count; does consume turn during summoning, support

name.jp: コンチェルトエクステンド

desc.en:
「Concerto」 use +1

When using 「Concerto」:
- Slightly raises the BRV gain based on Max BRV

While 「Note」 is active:
- Slightly raises Speed
- Turns 「HP Attack」 into 「HP Attack+」
　∟ Raises self BRV based on Max BRV before the HP attack
　∟ Raises party BRV based on HP damage dealt
　∟ Increases the percentage of gained BRV from HP damage dealt based on the number of active 「Note」 buffs
desc.gl:
Concerto use +1

When using Concerto:
 • Slight boost to BRV granted based on MAX BRV

While Note active:
 • Slightly raises own SPD
 • HP Attack becomes HP Attack+ (increases BRV based on MAX BRV before HP attack; grants party BRV based on HP damage dealt, party's Note total)
desc.jp:
「コンチェルト」の使用回数＋1

「コンチェルト」使用時
・最大BRVに依存したBRV加算量小アップ

自身に「音符」が付与されている時
・自身の素早さを小アップ
・通常「HP攻撃」が以下の「HP攻撃＋」に変化
　-HP攻撃前
　　自身に自身の最大BRVに依存した量のBRVを加算
　-HP攻撃後 与えたHPダメージに依存した量のBRVを
　　味方全員に加算
　-与えたHPダメージに依存した量のBRV加算は

　　BRV加算量アップ

name.jp: 不協和音のソナタエクステンド

desc.en:
「Dissonant Sonata」 use +2

When using 「Dissonant Sonata」:
- BRV attack hit count becomes 5
- Moderately raises total BRV potency
- Stolen BRV can overflow up to 150% Max BRV
- Triggers an HP attack after use

While 「Crescendo」 is active:
- Turns 「BRV Attack」 into 「BRV Attack+」
　∟ BRV attack hit count becomes 2
　∟ Slightly raises total BRV potency
　∟ Raises party BRV based on Max BRV
　∟ Raises BRV potency based on the number of active 「Note」 buffs
desc.gl:
Dissonant Sonata use +2

When using Dissonant Sonata:
 • BRV attack hit count becomes 5; moderately increased cumulative BRV damage
 • Stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 150%
 • Triggers additional HP attack on target after use

While Crescendo active:
BRV Attack becomes BRV Attack+ (BRV attack hit count becomes 2; slightly increased cumulative BRV damage; grants party BRV based on own MAX BRV; BRV damage boosted based on party's Note total)

name.jp: ヘビーストライクエクステンド

desc.en:
「Umbral Vise」 use +1

When using 「Umbral Vise」:
- BRV attack hit count becomes 3
- Tremendously raises its total BRV potency
- Stolen BRV can overflow up to 120% Max BRV
- Slightly improves the effects of 「Saboteur F」
- Grants 1 stack of 「Fangs of Transgression」 for 6 turns (max is 5)
- If target is inflicted with a debuff, grants an additional stack of 「Fangs of Transgression」
- Triggers an HP attack after use

While 「Saboteur F」 is active:
- Turns 「BRV Attack」 into 「BRV Attack (Saboteur)」
　∟ BRV attack hit count becomes 2
　　Slightly raises its total BRV potency
　　Greatly raises BRV damage dealt to debuffed enemies
　　Low Action Delay
desc.gl:
Umbral Vise use +1

When using Umbral Vise:
 • BRV attack hit count becomes 3; tremendously increased cumulative BRV damage
 • Stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 120%
 • Slight Saboteur F boost
 • Self: 6 turns 1 level of Fang of Transgression (limit 5)
 • Grants 1 additional level of Fang of Transgression when attacking debuffed target
 • Triggers additional HP attack after use

While Saboteur F active:
 • BRV Attack becomes BRV Attack+ (Saboteur) (BRV attack hit count becomes 2; slightly increased cumulative BRV damage; deals extra BRV damage to debuffed targets; high turn rate)

name.jp: エアリアルレイヴエクステンド

desc.en:
When using 「Whirlwind」:
- BRV attack hit count becomes 3
- Greatly raises its total BRV potency
- BRV Hits become AoE (Chase effect remains single target)
- Moderately raises BRV damage dealt to a single target
- Stolen BRV can overflow up to 150% Max BRV
- Slightly improves the effects of 「Commando F」
- Grants 1 stack of 「Fangs of Transgression」 for 6 turns (max is 5)
- If target is broken or gets broken, grants an additional stack of 「Fangs of Transgression」

While 「Commando F」 is active:
- Turns 「BRV Attack」 into 「BRV Attack (Commando)」
　∟ BRV attack hit count becomes 2
　　Slightly raises its total BRV potency
　　BRV Hits become AoE
　　Moderately raises BRV damage dealt to a single target (「BRV Attack」 during Chase is unaffected）
desc.gl:
When using Whirlwind:
 • BRV attack hit count becomes 3; largely increased cumulative BRV damage
 • BRV attack becomes group attack (non-targets' ease of Knock Back not affected by Break status)
 • Moderately increased BRV damage when attacking single target
 • Stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 150%
 • Slight Commando F boost
 • Self: 6 turns 1 level of Fang of Transgression (limit 5)
 • Grants 1 additional level of Fang of Transgression when inflicting Break on target or attacking target afflicted with Break

While Commando F active:
 • BRV Attack becomes BRV Attack+ (Commando) (BRV attack hit count becomes 2; slightly increased cumulative BRV damage; BRV attack becomes group attack; moderately increased BRV damage when attacking single target; [does not affect chained BRV attacks])

name.jp: ダークスラッシュエクステンド

desc.en:
[Dark Slash] use +2

When using [Dark Slash]
• BRV attack hit count becomes 4
• Increases total BRV potency by 160%
• Stolen BRV can overflow up to 120% Max BRV
• Deals 50% HP damage to non-targets

While [Dark Knight] is active and HP is above 50% of MAX
• [Dark Slash] becomes [Dark Slash+]
　∟ Increases BRV potency by 60%
　∟ Stolen BRV can overflow up to 150% Max BRV
desc.gl:
Dark Slash use +2

When using Dark Slash:
 • BRV attack hit count becomes 4; tremendously increased cumulative BRV damage
 • Stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 120%
 • Deals 50% HP damage to non-targets

While Dark Knight active and HP at least 50% of MAX:
 • Dark Slash becomes Dark Slash+ (moderate BRV damage boost; stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 150%)
desc.jp:
「ダークスラッシュ」の使用回数＋2

「ダークスラッシュ」使用時
・BRV攻撃のHIT数が4HITに変化し
　合計BRV威力も極大アップ
・奪ったBRVを最大BRVを超えて加算する
　上限は自身の最大BRVの120％分
・ターゲット以外にも50％分のHPダメージ

「ダークナイト」付与中かつ
自身のHPが最大HPの50％以上の時
「ダークスラッシュ」が「ダークスラッシュ＋」に変化し
以下の効果が追加
・BRV威力中アップ
・奪ったBRVを最大BRVを超えて加算する
　上限は自身の最大BRVの150％分に変化

name.jp: ダークナイトアタックブーストアップ

desc.gl: Moderately raises MAX BRV, ATK while Dark Knight active
desc.jp: 自身に「ダークナイト」が付与されている時\n自身の最大BRVと攻撃力を中アップ

name.jp: ダークバインドエクステンド

desc.en:
[Dark Bind] use +1

When using [Dark Bind]
• BRV attack hit count becomes 5
• Increases total BRV potency by 150%
• Stolen BRV can overflow up to 150% Max BRV
• Increases HP recovery based on HP damage dealt by 10%
• Shares 100% of excess HP recovered amongst allies (limit 10% of Max HP)

While [Dark Knight] is active and HP is above 50% of MAX
• [BRV Attack] becomes [BRV Attack+]
　∟ BRV attack hit count becomes 2
　∟ Increases total BRV potency by 80%
• [Dark Bind] becomes [Dark Bind+]
　∟ Increases BRV potency by 50%
　∟ Stolen BRV can overflow up to 180% Max BRV

While [Dark Knight] is active and HP is above 80% of MAX
• [BRV Attack+] becomes [BRV Attack++]
　∟ Increases BRV potency by 20%
desc.gl:
Dark Bind use +1

When using Dark Bind:
 • BRV attack hit count becomes 5; tremendously increased cumulative BRV damage
 • Stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 150%
 • Slightly increases HP recovered based on HP damage dealt
 • HP recovered in excess of MAX HP shared with allies; recovery limit: 10% of MAX HP

While Dark Knight active and HP at least 50% of MAX:
 • BRV Attack becomes BRV Attack+ (BRV attack hit count becomes 2; largely increased cumulative BRV damage)
 • Dark Bind becomes Dark Bind+ (moderate BRV damage boost; stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 180%)

While Dark Knight active and HP at least 80% of MAX:
 • BRV Attack+ becomes BRV Attack++ (slight BRV damage boost)
desc.jp:
「ダークバインド」の使用回数＋1

「ダークバインド」使用時
・BRV攻撃のHIT数が5HITに変化し
　合計BRV威力も極大アップ
・奪ったBRVを最大BRVを超えて加算する
　上限は自身の最大BRVの150％分
・与えたHPダメージに応じた自身のHP回復量小アップ
・超えたHP分 自身以外の味方のHPを分配回復
　回復量の上限は 対象の最大HPの10％分

「ダークナイト」付与中かつ
自身のHPが最大HPの50％以上の時
通常「BRV攻撃」が以下の「BRV攻撃＋」に変化
・BRV攻撃のHIT数が2HITに変化し
　合計BRV威力も大アップ
・「ダークバインド」が「ダークバインド＋」に変化し
　以下の効果が追加
　-BRV威力中アップ
　-奪ったBRVを最大BRVを超えて加算する
　　上限は自身の最大BRVの180％分に変化

「ダークナイト」付与中かつ
自身のHPが最大HPの80％以上の時
・「BRV攻撃＋」が「BRV攻撃＋＋」に変化し
　以下の効果が追加
　-BRV威力小アップ

name.jp: スケッチ召喚エクステンド

desc.en:
[Sketch Summon] use +2

When using [Sketch Summon]:
• Increases party's BRV by 50% of Max BRV before summon
• Raises own Attack by 60% during BRV attacks
• Triggers a 4-HIT AoE magic BRV attack before HP attack (50% per hit)
• Stolen BRV can overflow up to 150% Max BRV
• [MAX BRV Up] effect +30%; duration +2
• Self: 8 turns 40% [SPD Up]

While buffed
• [BRV Attack] becomes [BRV Attack+]:
　∟ BRV attack hit count becomes 2
　∟ Increases total BRV potency by 40%
　∟ Increases BRV damage dealt by 50% when attacking targets afflicted with [Sketch] debuff
desc.gl:
When using Sketch Summon:
 • Grants party BRV based on own MAX BRV before summon
 • Moderately increases BRV damage dealt with Sketch Summon
 • Stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 150%
 • Slight MAX BRV Up boost, duration +2
 • Self: 8 turns SPD Up II

With active buffs:
 • BRV Attack becomes BRV Attack+ (BRV attack hit count becomes 2; moderately increased cumulative BRV damage; deals extra BRV damage to targets afflicted with Sketch debuff)
desc.jp:
「スケッチ召喚」の使用回数＋2

「スケッチ召喚」使用時
・装備中の召喚獣に応じた効果発動前に
　味方全員に自身の最大BRVに依存した量のBRVを加算
・「スケッチ召喚」の与えるBRVダメージ中アップ
・HP攻撃前に
　4HIT全体魔法BRV攻撃を追加
・奪ったBRVを最大BRVを超えて加算する
　上限は自身の最大BRVの150％分
・「最大BRVアップ」の効果小アップと2ACTION期間延長
・自身に8ACTION「素早さ中アップ」付与

自身に強化効果が付与されている時
通常「BRV攻撃」が以下の「BRV攻撃＋」に変化
・BRV攻撃のHIT数が2HITに変化し
　合計BRV威力も中アップ
・「スケッチ」の弱体効果が付与された対象に
　より大きなBRVダメージ

[Sketch] use +4

When using [Sketch]:
• Increases party's BRV by 30% of Max BRV before BRV attacks
• BRV attack hit count becomes 5
• Increases total BRV potency by 120%
• Increases BRV damage dealt by 50% when attacking targets afflicted with [Sketch] debuff
• Stolen BRV can overflow up to 150% Max BRV
• [ATK Up] effect +20%; duration +3
• HP attack after use

After using [Sketch]
• [Sketch] becomes [Sketch+]
　∟ Moves own next turn to just before target's next turn on hit (except during summoning)
　∟ Target: 1 turn 50% [Blind]
　∟ Returns to [Sketch] after use
desc.gl:
Sketch use +2

When using Sketch:
 • BRV attack hit count becomes 3; tremendously increased cumulative BRV damage
 • Deals extra BRV damage to targets afflicted with Sketch debuff
 • Stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 120%
 • Slight ATK Up boost, duration +3
 • Triggers additional HP attack after use

After using Sketch:
 • Sketch becomes Sketch+ (moves own next turn to just before target's next turn on hit [except during summoning]; target: 1 turn Blind; returns to Sketch after use)
desc.jp:
「スケッチ」の使用回数＋4

「スケッチ」使用時
・BRV攻撃前に
　味方全員に自身の最大BRVに依存した量のBRVを加算
・BRV攻撃のHIT数が5HITに変化し
　合計BRV威力も極大アップ
・「スケッチ」の弱体効果が付与された対象に
　より大きなBRVダメージ
・奪ったBRVを最大BRVを超えて加算する
　上限は自身の最大BRVの150％分
・「攻撃力アップ」の効果小アップと3ACTION期間延長
・使用後 追加HP攻撃が発動

「スケッチ」使用後
「スケッチ」が「スケッチ＋」に変化し
以下の効果が追加
・対象にHIT時
　次回行動順がターゲットより後ろの場合

・対象に1ACTION「暗闇」付与
・使用後「スケッチ」に戻る

「Death Claw」 use +1

Death Claw use +1

When using Kotetsu:

name.jp: 乱舞エクステンド

desc.en:
「Mad Dance」 use +2

When using 「Mad Dance」, 「Wild Dance」:
- Greatly raises BRV potency
- Stolen BRV can overflow up to 150% Max BRV
- Slightly improves 「Max BRV Up」
- Grants 1 stack of 「Big Man on the Big Bridge」 for 3 turns (max is 5)

When using 「Genji Blade」:
- Tremendously raises BRV potency
- Stolen BRV can overflow up to 120% Max BRV
- Inflicts 「Small Speed Down」 for 3 turns

「Big Man on the Big Bridge」 has the following effects:
- Turns 「BRV Attack」 into 「Kotetsu」
- Turns 「HP Attack」 into 「Genji Blade」
- Raises self Attack based on the number of stacks
- Lowers all enemies' Attack
- At 5 stacks, raises self Critical Hit Rate and Critical Damage
desc.gl:
Mad Dance use +2

When using Mad Dance, Wild Dance:
 • Large BRV damage boost
 • Stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 150%
 • Slight MAX BRV Up boost
 • Self: 3 turns 1 level of Big Man on the Big Bridge (limit 5)

When using Genji Blade:
 • Tremendous BRV damage boost
 • Stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 120%
 • Target: 3 turns SPD Down I

name.jp: シフトミーティアエクステンド

desc.en:
When using [Shooting Star]
• All targets: 3 turns [Point-Blank Warp] (20% [DEF Down])

When using [Shooting Star], [Shooting Star+]
• 2-HIT ranged BRV attack + 2-HIT AoE ranged BRV attack
• Increases total BRV potency by 200%
• Stolen BRV can overflow up to 120% Max BRV
• HP attack after use
• Deals 50% HP damage to non-targets
• [MAX BRV Up] effect +30%; duration +3

When using [Shooting Star+]
• Self: 5 turns 1 level of [Armiger] (limit 5)
• Triggers follow-up attack when attacking target afflicted with [Point-Blank Warp]
　∟ Increases own BRV by 100% of Attack before BRV attacks
　∟ 3-HIT ranged BRV attack + HP attack (80% per hit)
　∟ BRV attack hit count increased by 1 while [Armiger] is active (BRV potency +120%)
　∟ Stolen BRV can overflow up to 120% Max BRV
• Initiates [Chase]
• Does not increase turn count
desc.gl:
When using Shooting Star:
 • All enemies: 3 turns Point-Blank Warp

When using Shooting Star, Shooting Star+:
 • Ranged BRV attack + group ranged BRV attack becomes 2-hit ranged BRV attack + 2-hit group ranged BRV attack; tremendously increased cumulative BRV damage
 • Stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 120%
 • Triggers additional HP attack on target after use
 • Deals 50% HP damage to non-targets
 • 8 turns slight boost to MAX BRV Up

When using Shooting Star+:
 • Self: 5 turns 1 level of Armiger (limit 5)
 • Triggers additional attack while target afflicted with Point-Blank Warp (increases BRV based on ATK before attack; 3-hit ranged BRV attack + HP attack; BRV attack hit count to target increased by 1 while Armiger active; stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 120%)
 • Knock Back to selected target on hit
 • Does not add to turn count; does consume turn during summoning, support, burst mode

　合計BRV威力も極大アップ
・奪ったBRVを最大BRVを超えて加算する
　上限は自身の最大BRVの120％分
・使用後 ターゲットに追加HP攻撃が発動
・ターゲット以外にも50％分のHPダメージ
・自身に5ACTION「最大BRVアップ」付与の
　効果小アップを追加し さらに3ACTION期間延長

「シフトミーティア＋」使用時
・自身に5ACTION「ファントムソード」1段階付与（上限5）
・ターゲットに「零距離シフト」の弱体効果が付与されている時
　以下の行動が追加発動
　-攻撃前に自身に自身の攻撃力に依存した量のBRVを加算
　-3HIT遠距離物理BRV攻撃＋HP攻撃
　-使用時「ファントムソード」が付与されている場合
　　アビリティのターゲットに対するBRV攻撃のHIT数が1HIT追加
　-奪ったBRVを最大BRVを超えて加算する
　　上限は自身の最大BRVの120％分
・ターゲットを吹きとばす
・総ACTION数に加算されない
　バーストモード中 召喚中およびフレンドサポートの残りACTIONは消費される

[Death Drop] use +2

When using [Death Drop+], [Warp Strike+]

　∟ Increases own BRV by 100% of Attack before BRV attacks

　∟ BRV attack hit count increased by 1 while [Armiger] is active (BRV potency +120%)

While [Armiger] is active
• [BRV Attack] becomes [BRV Attack+]
　∟ Ranged BRV attack

• [HP Attack] becomes [HP Attack+]

　∟ BRV attack hit count increased by 1 while [Armiger] is active (BRV potency +120%)
• [HP Attack+] becomes [HP Attack++]
　∟ BRV attack hit count becomes 2
　∟ Increases total BRV potency by 110%
　∟ BRV attack hit count increased by 1 while [Armiger] is active (BRV potency +120%)

　　　∟ Increases own BRV by 100% of Attack before BRV attacks

　　　∟ Stolen BRV can overflow up to 120% Max BRV
desc.gl:
Death Drop use +2

When using Death Drop, Warp-Strike:
 • Inflicts 3 turns Point-Blank Warp

When using Death Drop, Death Drop+, Warp-Strike, Warp-Strike+:
 • BRV attack hit count becomes 4; tremendously increased cumulative BRV damage
 • Stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 150%
 • 8 turns slight boost to ATK Up

When using Death Drop+, Warp-Strike+:
 • Self: 5 turns 1 level of Armiger (limit 5)
 • Triggers additional attack while target afflicted with Point-Blank Warp (increases BRV based on ATK; 3-hit ranged BRV attack + HP attack; BRV attack hit count to target increased by 1 while Armiger active; stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 120%)
 • Does not add to turn count; does consume turn during summoning, support, burst mode

With 1 to 4 levels of Armiger:
 • BRV Attack becomes BRV Attack+ (ranged BRV attack; moderately increased BRV damage)
 • HP Attack becomes HP Attack+ (ranged BRV attack + HP attack)
 • BRV attack hit count to target increased by 1 while Armiger active

With 5 levels of Armiger:
 • BRV Attack+ becomes BRV Attack++ (2-hit ranged BRV attack; tremendously increased cumulative BRV damage)
 • HP Attack+ becomes HP Attack++ (2-hit ranged BRV attack + HP attack; tremendously increased cumulative BRV damage; stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 120%; triggers additional attack while target afflicted with Point-Blank Warp [increases BRV based on ATK; 3-hit ranged BRV attack + HP attack; stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 120%])
 • BRV attack hit count to target increased by 1 while Armiger active

name.jp: ヴァルエアロエクステンド

desc.en:
[Veraero] use +2

When Quest starts
• Grants [Max BRV Up] for 8 turns

When using [Veraero] 
• Raises BRV based on Attack
• BRV attack hit count becomes 5
• Greatly raises total BRV potency 
• Stolen BRV can overflow up to 120% Max BRV
• Triggers an HP attack after use
• Lowers Action Delay

When using [Verstone] 
• Raises BRV based on Attack
• BRV attack hit count becomes 5 
• Tremendously raises total BRV potency 
• Stolen BRV can overflow up to 120% Max BRV
• Does not increase turn count
• Decreases Friend Support and Summon action count

When using [Enchanted Riposte] 
• BRV attack hit count becomes 3 
• Tremendously raises total BRV potency
• Stolen BRV can overflow up to 120% Max BRV

After using [Enchanted Redoublement]
• Turns [Veraero], [Verstone] to [Verholy]
　∟ Raises BRV based on Attack
　∟ 6-HIT magic BRV + HP attack
　∟ Stolen BRV can overflow up to 150% Max BRV
　∟ Low Action Delay
　∟ Grants 4 units of [White Mana] (limit 7)
　∟ Turns to [Verstone] after use
　∟ Reverts [Verflare] before using [Enchanted Redoublement]
desc.gl:
Veraero use +2

At start of quest:
 • Self: 8 turns MAX BRV Up I

When using Veraero:
 • Increases BRV based on ATK before BRV attack
 • BRV attack hit count becomes 5; largely increased cumulative BRV damage
 • Stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 120%
 • Triggers additional HP attack after use
 • Higher turn rate

When using Verstone:
 • Increases BRV based on ATK before BRV attack
 • BRV attack hit count becomes 5; tremendously increased cumulative BRV damage
 • Stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 120%
 • Does not add to turn count; does consume turn during summoning, support

When using Enchanted Riposte:
 • BRV attack hit count becomes 3; tremendously increased cumulative BRV damage
 • Stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 120%

After using Enchanted Redoublement:
 • Veraero, Verstone becomes Verholy (increases BRV based on ATK before BRV attack; 6-hit magic BRV attack + HP attack; stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 150%; high turn rate; increases special effect White Mana by 4 [limit 7]; becomes Verstone after use; returns Verflare to ability before using Enchanted Redoublement)
desc.jp:
「ヴァルエアロ」の使用回数＋2

自身に8ACTION「最大BRV小アップ」付与

When using Chain Slash:

After using Chain Slash:

　+ Moderate potency boost.
　+ Provokes the target for 2 turns (Lock debuff).

When using Chain Slash:
 • Moderate BRV damage boost

 • Increases BRV by 10% of HP damage dealt

After using Chain Slash:

desc.en:

- Second is a 2-HIT melee BRV+HP attack.
- Third is a 3-HIT melee BRV+HP attack.

After using Rush Assault:
- Turns HP Attack to HP Attack+ for 7 turns.

 • Increases BRV by 10% of cumulative HP damage dealt

After using Rush Assault:
• HP Attack becomes HP Attack+ (increases BRV based on MAX BRV before HP attack; increases BRV by 10% of HP damage dealt) for 7 turns

name.jp: トラインエクステンド

desc.en:
「Trine」 use +2

When using 「Trine」:
- Becomes AoE
- HP damage is split equally amongst all enemies
- Triggers 4 magic BRV hits after BRV multiplier
- Moderately raises BRV damage dealt to a single target
- Stolen BRV can overflow up to 150% Max BRV
- Lowers Action Delay

When attacking a debuffed target:
- Becomes 「Trine+」
　∟ Moderately raises BRV potency
　∟ Stolen BRV can overflow up to 180% Max BRV
desc.gl:
Trine use +2

When using Trine:
 • Becomes group attack; deals proportionate HP damage to each target
 • Additional 4-hit group BRV attack after BRV multiplier
 • Moderately increased BRV damage when attacking single target
 • Stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 150%
 • Turn rate+

While enemy is debuffed:
• Becomes Trine+ (moderate BRV damage boost; stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 180%)
desc.jp:
「トライン」の使用回数＋2

「トライン」使用時
・攻撃対象が全体化
　与えるHPダメージは分配
・自身のBRVを乗算した後に
　4HIT全体魔法BRV攻撃を追加
・攻撃対象が単体の時 与えるBRVダメージ中アップ
・奪ったBRVを最大BRVを超えて加算する
　上限は自身の最大BRVの150％分
・行動負荷ダウン

desc.en:
「No Mercy」 use +2

- BRV attack hit count becomes 4
- Tremendously raises total BRV potency
- Stolen BRV can overflow up to 150% Max BRV
- Triggers an HP Attack after use

 • Self: 6 turns Sorceress's Knight
 
While Sorceress's Knight active: 
 • HP Attack becomes HP Attack+ (group ranged BRV attack + group HP attack; deals proportionate HP damage to each target; moderately increases BRV damage dealt when attacking single target; deals extra BRV damage to debuffed targets)

desc.en:
[Laser Whip] use +4

When using [Laser Whip] 
• Raises party BRV based on Max BRV
• BRV attack hit count becomes 3 
• Moderately raises total BRV potency 
• Stolen BRV can overflow up to 120% Max BRV 
• Slightly improves the effect of [Action Delay Up] and extends its duration by 1 turn
• Triggers an HP attack after use

For 6 turns after using [Laser Whip]
• Turns [BRV Attack] to [BRV Attack+]
　∟ Raises party BRV based on Max BRV
　∟ BRV attack hit count becomes 2 
　∟ Slightly raises total BRV potency 
• Turns [HP Attack] to [HP Attack+]
　∟ 2-HIT melee BRV + HP attack
　∟ Stolen BRV can overflow up to 120% Max BRV 
　∟ Raises party BRV based on HP damage dealt
　∟ Low Action Delay
desc.gl:
Laser Whip use +4

When using Laser Whip:
 • Grants party BRV based on own MAX BRV before BRV attack
 • BRV attack hit count becomes 3; moderately increased cumulative BRV damage
 • Stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 120%
 • Slightly boosts Turn Rate Down; duration +1
 • Triggers additional HP attack on target after use

After using Laser Whip:
 • BRV Attack becomes BRV Attack+ (grants party BRV based on own MAX BRV, BRV attack hit count becomes 2; slightly increased cumulative BRV damage) for 6 turns
 • HP Attack becomes HP Attack+ (2-hit melee BRV attack + HP attack; stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 120%; grants party BRV based on HP damage dealt; high turn rate) for 6 turns

name.jp: ブラッドエクステンド

desc.en:
「Wound」 use +2

When using 「Wound」:
- Moderately raises BRV potency
- Becomes AoE
- Moderately raises BRV damage dealt to a single target
- Moderately 「Poison」 and extends its duration by 2 turns
- Slightly improves 「Max BRV Down」 and extends its duration by 2 turns
- Grants 「Unshaken Will」 for 5 turns
- Triggers a single target HP attack when BRV is over 80% Max BRV

While 「Unshaken Will」 is active:
- Turns 「Wound」 into 「Wound+」
　∟ BRV attack hit count becomes 2
　∟ Moderately raises total BRV potency
　∟ Triggers a single target HP attack after use
　∟ Deals 50% HP damage to non-targets
　∟ Raises allies' BRV based on HP damage dealt
- Turns 「BRV Attack」 into 「BRV Attack+」
　∟ Magic BRV attack
　∟ Raises party BRV based on Attack

「Unshaken Will」 has the following effects:
- Raises own Max BRV and Attack
- Raises party Defense and Speed
desc.gl:
Wound use +2

When using Wound:
 • Moderate BRV damage boost
 • Becomes group attack
 • Moderately increased BRV damage when attacking single target
 • Moderate Poison boost, duration +2
 • Slight MAX BRV Down boost, duration +2
 • Self: 5 turns Unshaken Will
 • Triggers additional HP attack on target if BRV is at least 80% of MAX after last hit

While Unshaken Will active:
 • Wound becomes Wound+ (BRV attack hit count becomes 2; moderately increased cumulative BRV damage; triggers additional HP attack on target after use; deals 50% HP damage to non-targets; grants allies BRV based on HP damage dealt to target)
 • BRV Attack becomes BRV Attack+ (magic BRV attack; grants party BRV based on own ATK)

name.jp: 不意打ちエクステンド

desc.en:
「Sneak Attack」 use +1

When using 「Sneak Attack」:
- BRV attack hit count becomes 4
- Greatly raises total BRV potency
- Stolen BRV can overflow up to 120% Max BRV
- Slightly raises BRV damage dealt when attacking enemies not targeting self
- Triggers an HP attack after use

After using 「Sneak Attack」:
- Becomes 「Sneak Attack (Hide)」
　∟ Slightly raises BRV potency
　∟ Stolen BRV can overflow up to 150% Max BRV
　∟ Deals extra BRV damage whether enemy is targeting self or not
　∟ Reverts to 「Sneak Attack」 after use
　∟ Reverts 「Powder Keg (Hide)」 to 「Powder Keg」 after use
desc.gl:
Sneak Attack use +1

When using Sneak Attack:
 • BRV attack hit count becomes 4; largely increased cumulative BRV damage
 • Stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 120%
 • Slightly increased BRV damage when attacking enemy not targeting self
 • Triggers additional HP attack after use

After using Sneak Attack:
 • Sneak Attack becomes Sneak Attack (Hide) (slight BRV damage boost; stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 150%; guaranteed hit, deals extra damage when attacking enemy whether or not targeting self; returns to Sneak Attack, Powder Keg (Hide) returns to Powder Keg after use)

name.jp: 三連回避エクステンド

desc.en:
「Triple Slip」 use +2

When using 「Triple Slip」:
- Greatly raises BRV gain based on Initial BRV
- Marginally improves Action Delay reduction of 「Charge & Dodge」
- Moderately improves Evasion Rate effect of 「Charge & Dodge」
- Adds 「Ice Enchant」 to 「Charge & Dodge」
- No Action Delay
- Does not increase turn count
- Decreases Friend Support and Summon action count

While buffed:
- 「BRV Attack」 becomes 「BRV Attack+」:
　∟ BRV attack hit count becomes 2
　∟ Moderately raises total BRV potency
- 「HP Attack」 becomes 「HP Attack+」:
　∟ 2-HIT ranged BRV + HP attack

While 「Charge & Dodge」 is active:
- 「BRV Attack+」 becomes 「Loaded Shot」
　∟ BRV attack hit count becomes 2
　∟ Greatly raises total BRV potency
　∟ Slightly raises BRV damage when dealing a critical hit
　∟ Stolen BRV can overflow up to 120% Max BRV
　∟ Raises BRV by 30% of HP damage dealt
　∟ Lowers Action Delay
- 「HP Attack」 and 「HP Attack+」 becomes 「Wide Shot」:
　∟ 2-HIT AoE ranged BRV attack + ST HP attack
　∟ Slightly raises BRV damage when dealing a critical hit
　∟ Stolen BRV can overflow up to 120% Max BRV
　∟ Deals 20% HP damage to non-targets
desc.gl:
Triple Slip use +2

When using Triple Slip:
 • Large boost to BRV increased based on INT BRV
 • Marginal turn rate boost with Charge & Dodge
 • Moderate evasion rate boost with Charge & Dodge
 • Adds effect of Ice Enchant to Charge & Dodge
 • Instant turn rate
 • Does not add to turn count; does consume turn during summoning, support

With active buff:
 • BRV Attack becomes BRV Attack+ (BRV attack hit count becomes 2; moderately increased cumulative BRV damage)
 • HP Attack becomes HP Attack+ (2-hit ranged BRV attack + HP attack)

While Charge & Dodge active:
 • BRV Attack+ becomes Charged Shot (2-hit ranged BRV attack + HP attack; largely increased cumulative BRV damage; slightly increased BRV damage with critical hits; stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 120%; increases BRV by 30% of HP damage dealt; turn rate+)
 • HP Attack, HP Attack+ becomes Wide Shot (2-hit group ranged BRV attack + single-target HP attack; slightly increased BRV damage with critical hits; stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 120%; deals 20% HP damage to non-targets)

desc.en:
「Steelguard」 use +2

- Gained BRV can overflow up to 120% Max BRV
- Slightly improves effect of 「Steelguard」
- Grants 1 stack of 「Legion of Steel」 for 10 turns (maximum of 3 stacks)
- Triggers a 2-HIT melee BRV + HP attack after use
- Stolen BRV can overflow up to 150% Max BRV
- Raises BRV based on 30% of HP damage dealt

When 「Legion of Steel」 is active:
- Turns 「BRV Attack」 into 「BRV Attack+」
　∟ BRV attack hit count becomes 2
　∟ Moderately raises total BRV potency
　∟ Raises party BRV based on Initial BRV (70% of Initial BRV)
- Turns 「HP Attack」 into 「HP Attack+」
　∟ Raises BRV based on Max BRV before attacking (20% of Max BRV)
　∟ Melee BRV + HP attack
　∟ Raises BRV based on 10% of HP damage dealt

「Legion of Steel」 has the following effects:
- Raises Initial BRV, Max BRV and Attack based on number of stacks
- Recovers BRV based on number of stacks
- Gains 1 additional stack when receiving a BRV Attack (only once per turn)
desc.gl:
Steelguard use +2

When using Steelguard:
 • Lock applied to all enemies
 • Moderate boost to BRV granted based on INT BRV, extended to party
 • Increased BRV may exceed individual MAX BRV up to 120%
 • Steelguard buff boost
 • Self: 10 turns 1 level of Offensive Screen (limit 3)
 • Triggers additional 2-hit melee BRV attack + HP attack on target after use
 • Stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 150%
 • Increases BRV by 30% of HP damage dealt

While Offensive Screen active:
 • BRV Attack becomes BRV Attack+ (BRV attack hit count becomes 2; moderately increased cumulative BRV damage; grants party BRV based on own INT BRV)
 • HP Attack becomes HP Attack+ (increases BRV based on MAX BRV before attack; becomes melee BRV attack + HP attack; increases BRV by 10% of HP damage dealt)

name.jp: オーラキャノンエクステンド

desc.en:
When using 「Aura Cannon」:
- BRV attack hit count becomes 4
- Tremendously raises total BRV potency
- Stolen BRV can overflow up to 120% Max BRV
- Deals 50% HP damage to non-targets
- Inflicts 「Wind & Holy Resistance Down」 to all enemies for 4 turns
- Grants 1 stack of 「Powers Unleashed」 for 8 turns instead of the initial 4 turns 「Attack Up」

When 「Powers Unleashed」 is at 3 stacks or higher:
- Turns 「Aura Cannon」 into 「Aura Cannon+」
　∟ Ignores Defense
　∟ Stolen BRV can overflow up to 180% Max BRV
　∟ Converts 50% of HP damage dealt to BRV
　∟ Does not grant 「Powers Unleashed」 stacks
　∟ Decreases 「Powers Unleased」 stacks by 2 after use

While 「Powers Unleashed」 is active:
- Turns 「BRV Attack」 into 「BRV Attack+」
　∟ Becomes a magic BRV Attack
　∟ BRV attack hit count becomes 2
　∟ Greatly raises total BRV potency
　∟ Greatly raises BRV damage dealt to Ghosts
　∟ Increases existing 「Powers Unleashed」 stacks by 1

「Powers Unleashed」 raises Max BRV and Attack
※Effects are not based on the number of stacks
desc.gl:
When using Aura Cannon:
 • BRV attack hit count becomes 4; tremendously increased cumulative BRV damage
 • Stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 120%
 • Deals 50% HP damage to non-targets
 • All targets: 4 turns Wind Holy Resist Down
 • 4 turns ATK Up II becomes 8 turns 1 level of Battle Spirit Unleashed (limit 4; slightly increased MAX BRV, moderately increased ATK; does not increase based on Battle Spirit Unleashed level)

Aura Cannon becomes Aura Cannon+ (BRV attack that ignores DEF; stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 180%; increases BRV by 50% of HP damage dealt to target; does not grant Battle Spirit Unleashed; cancels 2 levels of active Battle Spirit Unleashed) with at least 3 levels of Battle Spirit Unleashed

BRV Attack becomes BRV Attack+ (magic BRV attack; BRV attack hit count becomes 2; largely increased cumulative BRV damage; deals extra BRV damage to ghost types; increases active Battle Spirit Unleashed level by 1) while Battle Spirit Unleashed active
desc.jp:
「オーラキャノン」使用時
・BRV攻撃のHIT数が4HITに変化し
　合計BRV威力も極大アップ
・奪ったBRVを最大BRVを超えて加算する
　上限は自身の最大BRVの120％分
・ターゲット以外にも50％分のHPダメージ
・敵全体に4ACTION「風聖耐性ダウン」付与
・4ACTION「攻撃力中アップ」付与が
　8ACTION「闘魂解放（最大BRV小アップ＋攻撃力中アップ）」
　1段階付与（上限4）に変化
　（「闘魂解放」の段階に応じて効果は変動しない）

「闘魂解放」3段階以上付与中
「オーラキャノン」が「オーラキャノン＋」に変化し
以下の効果が追加
・防御力無視のBRV攻撃に変化
・奪ったBRVを最大BRVを超えて加算する
　上限は自身の最大BRVの180％分に変化
・ターゲットに与えたHPダメージの50％分
　自身のBRVをアップさせる
・「オーラキャノン＋」では「闘魂解放」は付与されない
・自身に付与されている「闘魂解放」の段階を2段階ダウン

「闘魂解放」付与中
通常「BRV攻撃」が以下の「BRV攻撃＋」に変化
・魔法BRV攻撃に変化
・BRV攻撃のHIT数が2HITに変化し
　合計BRV威力も大アップ
・ゴースト種に より大きなBRVダメージ
・自身に付与されている「闘魂解放」の段階を1段階アップ

- Slightly improves the 「Attack Up」 buff and extends its duration by 2 turns
- Stolen BRV can overflow up to 120% Max BRV
- Deals 20% HP damage to other targets
- Grants 1 stack of 「Suzaku's Trump Card」 for 6 turns (max is 5)
- Doesn't consume Card Stock after use

While 「Suzaku's Trump Card」 is active:
- Turns 「HP Attack」 into 「HP Attack+」 with the following effects:
　+ 3-HIT AoE magic BRV attack before the HP attack

While Card Stock is at 3 and 「Suzaku's Trump Card V」 is active:
- Turns 「Mega Spiral Combo」 into 「Mega Spiral Combo+」 with the following effects:
　+ BRV attack hit count becomes 10
　+ Moderately raises its total potency
　+ Stolen BRV can overflow up to 150% Max BRV
　+ Deals 50% HP damage to other targets
- Turns 「HP Attack+」 into 「HP Attack++」 with the following effects:
　+ Moderately raises potency
　+ Moderately raises BRV damage dealt to a single target
　+ Stolen BRV can overflow up to 150% Max BRV
　+ Lowers Action Delay
desc.gl:
When using Spiral Combo, Great Spiral Combo:
 • BRV attack becomes group attack
 • Moderately increased BRV damage when attacking single target

When using Spiral Combo:
 • BRV attack hit count becomes 2; tremendously increased cumulative BRV damage

When using Great Spiral Combo:
 • Tremendous BRV damage boost
 • Slight ATK Up boost, duration +2
 • Stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 120%
 • Deals 20% HP damage to non-targets
 • Self: 6 turns 1 level of Suzaku's Trump Card (limit 5)
 • Does not remove cards from stock

While Suzaku's Trump Card active:
• HP Attack becomes HP Attack+ (additional 3-hit group magic BRV attack before HP attack)

With 3 cards in stock and 5 levels of Suzaku's Trump Card active:
 • Great Spiral Combo becomes Great Spiral Combo+ (BRV attack hit count becomes 10; moderately increased cumulative BRV damage; stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 150%; deals 50% HP damage to non-targets)
 • HP Attack+ becomes HP Attack++ (Moderate BRV damage boost; moderately increased BRV damage when attacking single target; stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 150%; high turn rate)

desc.en:
[Shout] use +1

When using [Shout]
• Target: Inflicts BREAK
• [Shout] buff becomes level based; grants 1 level of [Shout] (limit 3)
• [Shout] buff effects +10% (does not increase based on level)
• Increases BRV gain based on Attack by 50%
• Triggers follow-up attack
　∟ 3-HIT melee BRV attack + HP attack (60% per hit)
　∟ Stolen BRV can overflow up to 150% Max BRV
• Lowers Action Delay by 4

While [Shout] is at 1 level
• [HP Attack] becomes [HP Attack+]
　∟ Increases own BRV by 70% of Attack
　∟ HP attack

While [Shout] is at 2 levels
• [HP Attack+] becomes [HP Attack++]
　∟ Increases BRV gain based on Attack by 10%

While [Shout] is at 3 levels
• [HP Attack++] becomes [HP Attack+++]
　∟ Increases BRV gain based on Attack by 20%
　∟ Melee BRV attack + HP attack (BRV potency 100%)
　∟ Stolen BRV can overflow up to 150% Max BRV
　∟ Does not increase turn count
　∟ Decreases Friend Support and Summon action count
desc.gl:
Shout use +1

When using Shout:
 • Shout buff becomes level based; grants one level of Shout buff (limit 3)
 • Slight Shout buff boost (does not increase based on level)
 • Moderate boost to BRV granted based on ATK
 • Triggers additional HP attack after use
 • Higher turn rate

With 1 level of Shout buff:
 • HP Attack becomes HP Attack+ (increases BRV based on ATK before HP attack)

With 2 levels of Shout buff:
 • HP Attack+ becomes HP Attack++ (slight boost to BRV granted based on ATK)

With 3 levels of Shout buff:
 • HP Attack++ becomes HP Attack+++ (slight boost to BRV granted based on ATK; additional melee BRV attack after granting BRV based on ATK; stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 150%; does not add to turn count; does consume turn during summoning, support)

name.jp: 短勁エクステンド

desc.en:
「One Ilm Punch」 use +1

When using 「One Ilm Punch」:
- Tremendously raises BRV potency 
- Stolen BRV can overflow up to 120% Max BRV
- Triggers an HP attack after use
- Raises BRV by 30% of HP Damage dealt
- Lowers Action Delay
- Does not increase turn count
- Decreases Friend Support and Summon action count

Turns 「Howling Fist (Transfixion)」 into 「Howling Fist (Transfixion)+」
- Becomes a 3-HIT melee BRV attack that ignores Defense
　∟ + 2-HIT Holy magic BRV attack that ignores Defense
　∟ + HP Attack
- Tremendously raises total BRV potency
- Stolen BRV can overflow up to 180% Max BRV
- Moderately improves 「Critical Rate Up」 and extends its duration by 3 turns

After using 「One Ilm Punch」:
- Turns 「Backhand Blow (Detonation)」 into 「Backhand Blow (Detonation)+」
　∟ Triggers an HP attack after use

When using 「Howling Fist (Fusion)」:
- Raises BRV based on Attack
　∟ + 3-HIT melee BRV attack
　∟ + 2-HIT Fire/Holy magic BRV attack
- Tremendously raises BRV potency 
- Stolen BRV can overflow up to 120% Max BRV
desc.gl:
One-Ilm Punch use +1

When using One-Ilm Punch: 
 • Tremendous BRV damage boost
 • Stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 120%
 • Triggers additional HP attack on target after use
 • Increases BRV by 30% of HP damage dealt
 • Turn rate+
 • Does not add to turn count; does consume turn during summoning, support

Howling Fist: Transfixion becomes Howling Fist: Transfixion+ (3-hit melee BRV attack that ignores DEF + 2-hit Holy magic BRV attack that ignores DEF + HP attack; tremendously increased cumulative BRV damage; stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 180%; slight Critical Hit Rate Up, duration +3)

After using One-Ilm Punch:
 • Backhand Blow: Detonation becomes Backhand Blow: Detonation+ (triggers additional HP attack on target after use)

When using Howling Fist: Fusion:
 • Increases BRV based on ATK before first BRV attack 
 • 3-hit melee BRV attack + 2-hit Fire Holy magic BRV attack; tremendous BRV damage boost
 • Stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 120%

desc.en:
「Spinning Attack」 use +1

When using 「Spinning Attack」:
- BRV attack hit count becomes 4 
- Greatly raises total BRV potency 
- Stolen BRV can overflow up to 150% Max BRV
- Triggers an AoE HP attack after use
- HP damage is split equally amongst all enemies

For 5 turns, after using 「Spinning Attack」:
- Enhances 「BRV Attack」, 「BRV Attack+」
　∟ BRV attack hit count becomes 3 
　∟ Tremendously raises total BRV potency
　∟ Extends duration by an additional 5 turns
- Enhances 「HP Attack」, 「HP Attack+」
　∟ Raises BRV based on Attack
　∟ + 2-HIT melee BRV + HP attack
　∟ Stolen BRV can overflow up to 120% Max BRV
　∟ Extends duration by an additional 5 turns

When using 「Backhand Blow (Detonation)」:
- Becomes 3-HIT melee BRV attack
　∟ + 2-HIT Wind magic BRV attack
- Tremendously raises total BRV potency 
- Moderately raises critical BRV damage dealt
- Stolen BRV can overflow up to 160% Max BRV

After using 「Spinning Attack」:

　∟ Triggers an HP attack after use

Turns 「Howling Fist (Fusion)」 into 「Howling Fist (Fusion)+」:
- Becomes 3-HIT melee BRV + HP attack
　∟ + 2-HIT Fire/Holy magic BRV + HP attack
- Raises BRV by 20% of HP damage dealt after the first HP attack

Spinning Attack use +1

 • BRV attack hit count becomes 4; largely increased cumulative BRV damage
 • Stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 150%
 • Triggers additional group HP attack after use; deals proportionate HP damage to each target

When using BRV Attack, BRV Attack+ for 10 turns after using Spinning Attack:

When using HP Attack, HP Attack+ for 10 turns after using Spinning Attack:

 • Becomes 2-hit melee BRV attack + HP attack
 • Stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 120%

When using Backhand Blow: Detonation:

 • Moderately increases BRV damage with critical hits
 • Stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 160%

After using Spinning Attack:
 • Backhand Blow: Detonation becomes Backhand Blow: Detonation+ (triggers additional HP attack after use)

When using Backhand Blow: Detonation+:
 • Deals 50% HP damage to non-targets

Howling Fist: Fusion becomes Howling Fist: Fusion+ (triggers additional HP attack after last melee BRV attack and last Fire Holy magic BRV attack; increases BRV by 20% of HP damage dealt after first HP attack)

name.jp: スナッチショットエクステンド

desc.en:
「Snatch Shot」 use +2

When using 「Snatch Shot」:
- BRV hits become AoE
- BRV attack hit count becomes 2
- Moderately raises BRV damage dealt to a single target
- Moderately raises the success rate of the buff stealing effect
- Grants 1 stack of 「Way of the Sky Pirate」 for 8 turns (max is 3)
- Grants an additional stack of 「Way of the Sky Pirate」 if target is broken
- Triggers an HP attack after use

While 「Way of the Sky Pirate III」 is active:
- Turns 「Snatch Shot」 into 「Snatch Shot+」
　∟ BRV attack hit count becomes 4
　∟ Greatly raises total BRV potency
　∟ Stolen BRV can overflow up to 120% Max BRV

While 「Way of the Sky Pirate」 is active:
- Turns 「BRV Attack」 into 「BRV Attack+」
　∟ BRV attack hit count becomes 2
　∟ Greatly raises total BRV potency
　∟ If 「Way of the Sky Pirate」 is active, grants 1 additional stack
　∟ Medium probability of stealing a random buff from the target

「Way of the Sky Pirate」 has 3 stackable effects depending on the stage:
- At I, grants 「Physical Attack Up」
- At II, adds a 「Max BRV Up」 effect
- At III, adds an 「Attack Up」 effect
desc.gl:
Snatch Shot use +2

When using Snatch Shot:
 • BRV attack hit count becomes 2; becomes group attack
 • Moderately increased BRV damage when attacking single target
 • Moderately increased buff steal rate
 • Self: 8 turns 1 level of Way of the Sky Pirate (limit 3)
 • Grants 1 additional level of Way of the Sky Pirate when inflicting Break on target or attacking target afflicted with Break
 • Triggers additional HP attack on target after use

While 3 levels of Way of the Sky Pirate active:
 • Snatch Shot becomes Snatch Shot+ (BRV attack hit count becomes 4; largely increased cumulative BRV damage; stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 120%)

While Way of the Sky Pirate active:
 • BRV Attack becomes BRV Attack+ (BRV attack hit count becomes 2; largely increased cumulative BRV damage; increases active Way of the Sky Pirate level by 1; occasionally steals 1 random buff from target)

name.jp: メルトン（詠唱）エクステンド

desc.gl:
Meltdown (Chant) use +1

When using Meltdown (Chant):
 • Slight boost to BRV granted based on ATK
 • Slight MAX BRV Up effect boost

When using Meltdown+:
 • Additional magic BRV attack before HP attack
 • Stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 120%
 • Increases special effect Magic by 5 (limit 9)

While special effect Magic at least 5:
 • Meltdown+ becomes Magic Meltdown+ (BRV attack hit count becomes 2; tremendously increased cumulative BRV damage; deals 50% HP damage to non-targets; consumes 4 special effect Magic instead of increasing by 5)

While special effect Magic at least 1:
 • BRV Attack becomes BRV Attack+ (BRV attack hit count becomes 2; moderately increased cumulative BRV damage; increases special effect Magic by 3 [limit 9])
desc.jp:
「メルトン（詠唱）」の使用回数＋3

「メルトン（詠唱）」使用時
・攻撃力に依存したBRV加算量小アップ
・「最大BRVアップ」の効果小アップ

「メルトン＋」使用時
・HP攻撃前に4HIT魔法BRV攻撃を追加
・奪ったBRVを最大BRVを超えて加算する
　上限は自身の最大BRVの150％分
・自身に特殊効果「魔導」5加算（上限9）

特殊効果「魔導」5以上の時
「メルトン＋」が以下の「魔導メルトン＋」に変化し
以下の効果が追加
・合計BRV威力大アップ
・ターゲット以外にも80％分のHPダメージ
・自身の特殊効果「魔導」5加算が4消費に変化

特殊効果「魔導」1以上の時
通常「BRV攻撃」が以下の「BRV攻撃＋」に変化
・BRV攻撃のHIT数が2HITに変化し
　合計BRV威力も中アップ
・自身に特殊効果「魔導」3加算（上限9）

name.jp: バフベースブーストアップ

desc.en: Moderately raises Initial BRV and Max BRV while buffed
desc.gl: Moderately raises INT BRV, MAX BRV with active buffs
desc.jp: 自身に強化効果が付与されている時\n自身の初期BRVと最大BRVを中アップ

name.jp: メテオ（詠唱）エクステンド

desc.gl:
Meteor (Chant) use +1

When using Meteor+:
 • BRV attack hit count becomes 15; tremendously increased cumulative BRV damage
 • Stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 120%
 • Increases special effect Magic by 5 (limit 9)

While special effect Magic at least 5:
 • Meteor+ becomes Magic Meteor+ (BRV attack becomes group attack; moderate cumulative BRV damage boost; moderately increased BRV damage when attacking single target; stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 180%; consumes 4 special effect Magic instead of increasing by 5)

While special effect Magic at least 1:
 • HP Attack becomes HP Attack+ (magic BRV attack + HP attack; stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 120%; increases special effect Magic by 3 [limit 9])
desc.jp:
「メテオ（詠唱）」の使用回数＋3

「メテオ＋」使用時
・BRV攻撃が敵全体化
・BRV攻撃のHIT数が15HITに変化し
　合計BRV威力も極大アップ
・攻撃対象が単体の時 与えるBRVダメージ中アップ
・奪ったBRVを最大BRVを超えて加算する
　上限は自身の最大BRVの150％分
・自身に特殊効果「魔導」5加算（上限9）

特殊効果「魔導」5以上の時
「メテオ＋」が「魔導メテオ＋」に変化し
以下の効果が追加
・15HIT全体魔法BRV攻撃＋単体HP攻撃が
　5HIT全体魔法BRV攻撃＋単体HP攻撃
　＋与えたHPダメージの20％分自身のBRVをアップ
　＋10HIT全体魔法BRV攻撃＋単体HP攻撃に変化し
　合計BRV威力も中アップ
・奪ったBRVを最大BRVを超えて加算する上限中アップ

name.jp: ヘイストルンバエクステンド

desc.en:
[Haste Rhumba] use +2

When using [Haste Rhumba]
• Increases party's BRV by 40% of Max BRV
• Self: 4 turns 1 level of [Rhumba Step] (limit 3)
• Granted buffs duration +3
• Cancels [Waltz Step]
• Lowers Action Delay by 30
• Does not increase turn count
• Decreases Friend Support and Summon action count

While [Rhumba Step] is active
• [BRV Attack] becomes [BRV Attack+ (Rhumba)]
　∟ BRV attack hit count becomes 2
　∟ Increases total BRV potency by 20% (60% x2)
　∟ Increases party's BRV by 20% Max BRV
• [HP Attack] becomes [HP Attack+ (Rhumba)]
　∟ Increases own BRV by 20% Max BRV
　∟ Melee BRV + HP attack (60%)

While [Rhumba Step III] is active
• [BRV Attack+ (Rhumba)] becomes [BRV Attack++ (Rhumba)]
　∟ BRV attack hit count becomes 3
　∟ Increases total BRV potency by 120% (80% x3)
• [HP Attack+ (Rhumba)] becomes [HP Attack++ (Rhumba)]
　∟ BRV attack hit count becomes 2
　∟ Increases total BRV potency by 120% (90% x2)
　∟ Stolen BRV can overflow up to 120% Max BRV

[Rhumba Step]
• Raises own INT BRV, SPD by 40%, ATK by 20%
• Raises party's ATK by 40%
• Effects do not change based on level
desc.gl:
Haste Rhumba use +2

When using Haste Rhumba:
 • Grants party BRV based on own MAX BRV
 • Self: 4 turns 1 level of Rhumba Step (limit 3); Rhumba Step level retained when canceled
 • Granted buff duration +3
 • Cancels Waltz Step
 • Turn rate+
 • Does not add to turn count; does consume turn during summoning, support

While Rhumba Step active:
 • BRV Attack becomes BRV Attack+ (Rhumba) (BRV attack hit count becomes 2; slightly increased cumulative BRV damage; grants party BRV based on own MAX BRV after BRV attack)
 • HP Attack becomes HP Attack+ (Rhumba) (Increases BRV based on MAX BRV before attack; melee BRV attack + HP attack)

With 3 levels of Rhumba Step:
 • BRV Attack+ (Rhumba) becomes BRV Attack++ (Rhumba) (BRV attack hit count becomes 3; tremendously increased cumulative BRV damage)
 • HP Attack+ (Rhumba) becomes HP Attack++ (Rhumba) (BRV attack hit count becomes 2; tremendously increased cumulative BRV damage; stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 120%)

desc.en:
「Rapid Bullets」 use +2

- Slightly improves 「Attack Up」 and extends its duration by 4 turns

- Moderately raises total BRV potency

Rapid Bullets use +2

When using Rapid Bullets:

 • Stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 120%
 • Triggers additional HP attack after use

When using Rapid Bullets+:
 • BRV attack hit count becomes 4; moderately increased cumulative BRV damage
 • Stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 150%

desc.en:
[Darkness] use +2

When using [Darkness]
• BRV attack hit count becomes 6

• Increases BRV damage dealt by 60% when attacking single target
• [MAX BRV Up] effect +25%; duration +4
• Self: 4 turns [Power of Darkness] 
• HP attack after use

When HP is less than 50% of MAX
• [Darkness] becomes [Darkness+]
　∟ Increases BRV potency by 60%
　∟ Stolen BRV can overflow up to 180% Max BRV
　∟ Self: 4 turns [Light within Darkness]

While [Power of Darkness] is active
• [BRV Attack] becomes [BRV Attack+]
　∟ BRV attack hit count becomes 2
　∟ Increases total BRV potency by 80%
• [HP Attack] becomes [HP Attack+]
　∟ Melee BRV attack + HP attack (BRV potency 80%)
　∟ Stolen BRV can overflow up to 120% Max BRV
　∟ Cancels [Light within Darkness] after use

[Power of Darkness]
• Raises Max BRV by 10%, Attack by 30%
• Reduces HP damage taken by 10%

[Light within Darkness]
• Restores BRV by 60% of INT BRV
desc.gl:
Darkness use +2

When using Darkness:
 • BRV attack hit count becomes 4; tremendously increased cumulative BRV damage
 • Stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 150%
 • Moderately increased BRV damage when attacking single target
 • 6 turns slight boost to MAX BRV Up
 • Self: 4 turns Power of Darkness
 • Triggers additional HP attack on target after use

Darkness becomes Darkness+ (moderate BRV damage boost; stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 180%; self: 4 turns Light within Darkness) while HP less than 50% of MAX

While Power of Darkness active:
 • BRV Attack becomes BRV Attack+ (BRV attack hit count becomes 2; largely increased cumulative BRV damage)
 • HP Attack becomes HP Attack+ (melee BRV attack + HP attack; stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 120%; cancels Light within Darkness)

desc.en:
[Valiant Blow] use +1

When using [Valiant Blow]

• Stolen BRV can overflow up to 120% Max BRV
• [ATK Up] effect +10%, duration +3
• Self: 4 turns [Power of Darkness]
• HP attack after use

When HP is less than 50% of MAX
• [Valiant Blow] becomes [Valiant Blow+]
　∟ BRV attack hit count becomes 6
　∟ Increases total BRV potency by 90%
　∟ Stolen BRV can overflow up to 150% Max BRV
　∟ Deals 50% HP Damage to non-targets
　∟ Increases allies' BRV by 50% of HP damage dealt to target
　∟ Self: 4 turns [Light within Darkness]

While both [Power of Darkness] and [Light within Darkness] are active
• [BRV Attack], [BRV Attack+] become [BRV Attack++]
　∟ BRV attack hit count becomes 2
　∟ Increases total BRV potency by 80%
　∟ Recovers own HP by 20% of HP damage dealt (limit 5% of Max HP)
• [HP Attack], [HP Attack+] become [HP Attack++]
　∟ Melee BRV attack + HP attack (BRV potency 80%)
　∟ Stolen BRV can overflow up to 120% Max BRV
　∟ Recovers own HP by 50% of HP damage dealt (limit 20% of Max HP)
　∟ Cancels [Light within Darkness] after use
desc.gl:
Valiant Blow use +1

When using Valiant Blow:
 • BRV attack hit count becomes 4; tremendously increased cumulative BRV damage
 • Stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 120%
 • 8 turns slight boost to ATK Up
 • Self: 4 turns Power of Darkness
 • Triggers additional HP attack after use

Valiant Blow becomes Valiant Blow+ (large BRV damage boost; stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 150%; slight boost to BRV granted based on HP damage dealt; self: 4 turns Light within Darkness) while HP less than 50% of MAX

While Power of Darkness, Light within Darkness active:
 • BRV Attack, BRV Attack+ become BRV Attack++ (BRV attack hit count becomes 2; largely increased cumulative BRV damage; slightly restores own HP based on BRV damage dealt; recovery limit: 5% of own MAX HP)
 • HP Attack, HP Attack+ become HP Attack++ (melee BRV attack + HP attack; stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 120%; moderately restores own HP based on HP damage dealt; recovery limit: 20% of own MAX HP; cancels Light within Darkness)

name.jp: 掌打ラッシュエクステンド

desc.en:
「Beat Rush」 use +2

When using 「Beat Rush」:
- Raises BRV based on Attack before the BRV hits
- Slightly raises BRV potency
- Slightly raises BRV damage bonus against Skeleton-type enemies
- Stolen BRV can overflow up to 150% Max BRV
- Triggers an HP attack after use
- Lowers Action Delay

When breaking target or attacking a broken target:
- 「Beat Rush」 turns into 「Beat Rush+」
　∟ Slightly raises the BRV gain based on Attack
　∟ Slightly raises BRV potency
　∟ Stolen BRV can overflow up to 180% Max BRV
　∟ Reverts to 「Beat Rush」 after use unless breaking target or attacking a broken target
desc.gl:
Beat Rush use +2

When using Beat Rush:
 • Increases BRV based on ATK before BRV attack
 • Slight BRV damage boost
 • Slight BRV damage boost when attacking skeleton types
 • Stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 150%
 • Triggers additional HP attack after use
 • Turn rate+
 • Beat Rush becomes Beat Rush+ (slight boost to BRV granted based on ATK; slight BRV damage boost; stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 180%; returns to Beat Rush after use; does not return to Beat Rush when inflicting Break or attacking target afflicted with Break) when inflicting Break or attacking target afflicted with Break
desc.jp:
「掌打ラッシュ」の使用回数＋2

「掌打ラッシュ」使用時
・BRV攻撃前
　自身に自身の攻撃力に依存した量のBRVを加算
・BRV威力小アップ
・スケルトン種攻撃時のBRVダメージ小アップ
・奪ったBRVを最大BRVを超えて加算する
　上限は自身の最大BRVの150％分
・使用後 追加HP攻撃が発動
・行動負荷ダウン
・対象ブレイク後 ブレイク中攻撃後
　「掌打ラッシュ」が「掌打ラッシュ＋」に変化し
　以下の効果が追加
　-自身の攻撃力に依存した量のBRV加算量小アップ
　-BRV威力小アップ
　-奪ったBRVを最大BRVを超えて加算する
　　上限は自身の最大BRVの180％分に変化
　-使用後 「掌打ラッシュ」に戻る
　　対象ブレイク後 ブレイク中攻撃後は
　　「掌打ラッシュ」に戻らない

[Attack Boost] use +3

After using Attack Boost:
 • BRV Attack becomes BRV Attack+ (BRV attack hit count becomes 2; large cumulative BRV damage boost; guaranteed hit; target: 6 turns ATK Down I, DEF Down I) for 10 turns

When using HP Attack, HP Attack+ for 10 turns after using Attack Boost:

desc.en:
[Focus] use +2

When using [Focus]:
• Slightly improves effect of [Attack Up]
• Extends duration of [Max BRV Up] and [Attack Up] by 4 turns
• Grants [Black Mage's Torch] for 10 turns
• Triggers the following attack after use:
　∟ 4-HIT Fire magic BRV attack + HP attack
　∟ Stolen BRV can overflow up to 180% Max BRV

While [Black Mage's Torch] is active:
• [Fire] becomes [Fire+]
　∟ BRV attack hit count becomes 4
　∟ Slightly raises total BRV potency
　∟ Stolen BRV can overflow up to 180% Max BRV
　∟ Triggers an HP attack after use
• [BRV Attack] becomes [BRV Attack+]
　∟ 2-HIT Fire magic BRV attack
　∟ Moderately raises total BRV potency
• [HP Attack] becomes [HP Attack+]
　∟ Fire magic BRV attack + HP attack
desc.gl:
Focus use +2

When using Focus:
 • Slight ATK Up boost
 • MAX BRV Up, ATK Up duration +4
 • Self: 10 turns Black Mages' Torch

After using Focus:
 • 4-hit Fire magic BRV attack + HP attack on selected target
 • Stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 180%

While Black Mages' Torch active:
 • Fire becomes Fire+ (BRV attack hit count becomes 4; slightly increased cumulative BRV damage; stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 180%; triggers additional HP attack after use)
 • BRV Attack becomes BRV Attack+ (2-hit Fire magic BRV attack; moderately increased cumulative BRV damage)
 • HP Attack becomes HP Attack+ (Fire magic BRV attack + HP attack)

name.jp: シャインシールドエクステンド

desc.en:
[Shining Shield] use +2

When using [Shining Shield]
• Raises party BRV by 50% of Initial BRV
• Moderately improves the BRV Multiplier effect and extends it to party
• Gained BRV can overflow up to 120% Max BRV
• Greatly improves effects of [Shield] and extends its duration by 2 turns
• [Shield] is granted to party
• Integrates Max BRV Up, Attack Up and BRV Regen into [Will of Light] and extends its duration by 2 turns
• Triggers an HP attack after use

While [Will of Light] is active
• Turns [BRV Attack] to [BRV Attack+]
　∟ Raises party BRV based on Initial BRV
　∟ BRV attack hit count becomes 2
　∟ Moderately raises total BRV potency
• Turns [HP Attack] to [HP Attack+]
　∟ Raises BRV Based on Initial BRV
　∟ + melee BRV + HP attack
　∟ Stolen BRV can overflow up to 120% Max BRV

While [Will of Light] is active and 3 [Shield] buffs are active
• Turns [BRV Attack+] to [BRV Attack++]
　∟ Moderately raises BRV potency
• Turns [HP Attack+] to [HP Attack++]
　∟ BRV attack hit count becomes 2
　∟ Slightly raises total BRV potency
　∟ Gained BRV can overflow up to 120% Max BRV
　∟ Stolen BRV can overflow up to 150% Max BRV
desc.gl:
Shining Shield use +2

When using Shining Shield:
 • Grants target 50% INT BRV before BRV multiplier, extended to party
 • Moderate boost to target's BRV multiplier, extended to party
 • Shield extended to party
 • MAX BRV Up extended to party, becomes Will of Light (slightly raises ATK; BRV Regen effect)
 • Triggers additional HP attack after use

While Will of Light active:
 • BRV Attack becomes BRV Attack+ (BRV attack hit count becomes 2; moderately increased cumulative BRV damage)
 • HP Attack becomes HP Attack+ (increases BRV based on INT BRV before HP attack)

While Will of Light active and party's total Shield count 3:
 • BRV Attack+ becomes BRV Attack++ (moderate BRV damage boost)
 • HP Attack+ becomes HP Attack++ (becomes melee BRV attack + HP attack; stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 120%)
desc.jp:
「シャインシールド」の使用回数＋2

「シャインシールド」使用時
・BRV乗算前に 対象のBRVを初期BRVの50％分追加し
　味方全体化
・対象へのBRV乗算量を中アップし味方全体化
・加算したBRVを最大BRVを超えて加算する
　上限はそれぞれの最大BRVの120％分
・「シールド」付与を味方全体化し
　効果大アップと2ACTION期間延長
・「最大BRVアップ」の効果が味方全体化し
　味方全員の攻撃力小アップと
　BRVリジェネの効果が追加された
　強化効果「光の意志」に変化し
　さらに2ACTION期間延長
・使用後 追加HP攻撃が発動

「光の意志」付与中
・通常「BRV攻撃」が以下の「BRV攻撃＋」に変化
　-BRV攻撃前に味方全員に
　　自身の初期BRVに依存した量のBRVを加算
　-BRV攻撃のHIT数が2HITに変化し
　　合計BRV威力も中アップ
・通常「HP攻撃」が以下の「HP攻撃＋」に変化
　-自身の初期BRVに依存した量のBRVを加算し
 　近距離物理BRV攻撃＋HP攻撃
　-奪ったBRVを最大BRVを超えて加算する
　 上限は自身の最大BRVの120％分

「光の意志」付与中　かつ
味方全員の「シールド」の数が合計3個の時
・「BRV攻撃＋」が以下の「BRV攻撃＋＋」に変化し
　以下の効果が追加
　-BRV威力中アップ
・「HP攻撃＋」が以下の「HP攻撃＋＋」に変化し
　以下の効果が追加
　-BRV攻撃のHIT数が2HITに変化し
　　合計BRV威力も小アップ
　-加算したBRVを最大BRVを超えて加算する
　 上限は自身の最大BRVの120％分
　-奪ったBRVを最大BRVを超えて加算する
　 上限は自身の最大BRVの150％分
